price: 71. (Luud) wuxuu yidhi: Kuwaanu waa gabdhahaygii16, haddaad yeeleysaan (inaad guursataan).
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
footnotes: 16. Gabdhaha qoonkiisa ee u bannaan inay guursadaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
